channel.title: Epic question!
channel.description:
I got an epic question to you: My client and source runs okay on my both computers but when i send it to my friend, he tries to play and can log in.. The thing is; he can click one time and afterthe second click his client exits!! source says no error so i pretty much guess this is computer or client sided.. the question comes: How to fix this?! It's a delta base...
Thanks for help , cuz I'm Clueless!

item.title: Epic question!
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

ghostly150:

Is your friend on windows 7?

I have Windows 7 64-bit and I have never had problems with any Java-based applications.

Read full topic

item.title: Epic question!
item.dc:creator: @laveerre laveerre
item.description:
@laveerre wrote:

No, he has vista 64-bit and the problem may lie there… I think I got this one though…

Read full topic
